reports.title: Assessment of School Facilities
reports.question: Your school principal has asked you to write a report assessing the current school facilities and suggesting improvements.
keyPoints: Describe the current condition of the facilities

styles.default:
Introduction
The main objective of this report is to assess the current school facilities. This report is based on a questionnaire conducted among over 200 students.
General View
It is generally agreed that the school provides a pleasant learning environment. The classrooms are in good condition and many students referred to the new IT equipment as helpful for lessons. By far the best aspect of the facilities is the sports hall, which is modern and well-equipped.
Problems
However, one major concern expressed by students is the overcrowded library. By far the worst aspect of the IT facilities is that machines frequently break down. The library is far from ideal since it lacks sufficient seating during exam periods. This is mainly due to the fact that student numbers have increased significantly.
Recommendations
One key recommendation would be to replace outdated computers with modern equipment. In order to maximize study space, I would strongly recommend adding more library seating. It is essential that the school invests in covered outdoor areas. Taking everything into account, it seems clear that these improvements would significantly enhance the learning environment.
styles.professional:
Introduction
The aim of this report is to provide a summary of current school facilities. The findings in this report are drawn from a survey of 215 students.
Current Situation
There is a broad consensus that the school offers adequate facilities. What makes the library so valuable is that it offers a wide selection of resources. One positive aspect of the facilities is the sports hall, which is well-equipped.
Criticisms
However, one major criticism expressed by students is the outdated computer equipment. By far the worst aspect of the IT facilities is that machines frequently break down. The library suffers from limited seating. This is mainly due to the fact that student numbers have increased significantly.
Recommendations
If we were to improve facilities, one key recommendation would be to replace outdated computers. I would strongly recommend adding more library seating. It is essential that toilet facilities are renovated.
Conclusion
The main conclusion to be drawn is that targeted improvements would enhance the learning environment. To sum up, students would benefit greatly from these changes.
styles.formal:
Introduction
This report aims to provide a summary of my recent assessment of school facilities. The information presented in this report was collected through interviews and feedback obtained during the evaluation.
Positive Aspects
It was generally felt by all participants that the school provides a pleasant environment. What made the accommodation so successful was that classrooms are well-maintained. The highlight of the facilities was the sports hall, which students use regularly for activities.
Areas for Improvement
One major concern expressed by many students is the overcrowded library. The computer facilities are far from ideal, considering that machines often break down. Since student numbers have grown, the library lacks sufficient seating during exam periods.
Recommendations and Conclusion
In order to improve facilities, I would strongly recommend replacing old computers and adding library seating. It is essential that these changes are made very soon. In conclusion, as can be seen from the findings, students would benefit greatly. I strongly recommend that the school makes these improvements.

reports.title: Evaluation of Spain Exchange Programme
reports.question: You recently participated in a two-week student exchange programme in Spain.
keyPoints: Describe the accommodation and school activities

styles.default:
Introduction
The aim of this report is to evaluate the two-week student exchange programme in Valencia, Spain. This report is based on my experience and feedback from 15 participating students.
Accommodation and Activities
It was generally felt by all participants that host families were exceptionally welcoming. What made the accommodation so successful was that families encouraged Spanish conversation at mealtimes. We attended daily Spanish lessons and participated in cultural activities. The highlight of the programme was sports exchanges with local students.
Learning Outcomes
By far the best aspect of the exchange was that conversation skills improved dramatically. Students gained confidence using language authentically. The immersive learning experience is far from what classroom instruction can provide. We developed international friendships and understood Spanish culture firsthand.
Recommendations
I would strongly recommend continuing this programme as language benefits far exceed classroom learning. In order to optimize outcomes, pre-departure lessons would help students prepare. It is essential that host family communication is improved beforehand. Taking everything into account, this represents invaluable educational value.
styles.professional:
Introduction
This report aims to provide a summary of the student exchange programme conducted in Valencia, Spain during March 2025. The findings in this report are drawn from interviews and feedback obtained from all 15 participating students.
General View
There is a broad consensus that the programme was highly successful overall. Host families demonstrated exceptional hospitality and commitment to language immersion. Daily instructional sessions provided structured grammatical development. Many visitors referred to the cultural programming as both authentic and highly valuable. Sports integration facilitated informal language acquisition and cross-cultural relationships.
Positive Aspects
What makes this programme so valuable is that it delivered substantial benefits across multiple areas of language learning. Linguistic competency improved measurably throughout the two weeks. By far the best aspect of the experience was gaining confidence in authentic language application with native speakers.
Recommendations
If we were to continue the programme, one key recommendation would be to enhance pre-departure preparation sessions. I would strongly recommend improved host family communication protocols before arrival. In conclusion, this programme represents exceptional educational value.
styles.formal:
Introduction
The main objective of this report is to evaluate the Valencia student exchange programme. The information presented in this report was collected through my personal observations and experiences during the two-week visit to Spain.
What Worked Well
It is generally agreed that living with Spanish host families was extremely beneficial for language development. What made the experience so interesting was that families actively encouraged constant Spanish practice during meals and activities. Morning lessons provided essential grammar structure and vocabulary. One positive aspect of the programme was the cultural activities like museums and theatre performances, which gave authentic context to our learning.
Learning and Development
By far the most valuable aspect was discovering I could successfully navigate unfamiliar situations in Spanish. Daily achievements like ordering coffee independently or understanding local jokes accumulated into genuine transformation and growing confidence in my language abilities.
Recommendations
I would strongly recommend that the school continues offering this programme to future students. One way to improve the experience would be through more thorough pre-departure preparation. In conclusion, as can be seen from my experience, this exchange offers truly invaluable education.
